translation.en: [woman 1] I find AI to be awe-inspiring.
translation.zh: ‎我认为人工智能颇为令人惊叹

translation.en: All right, circling up. Good formation.
translation.zh: ‎好的 盘旋 阵型不错

translation.en: [woman 1] AI has the potential to eliminate poverty,
translation.zh: ‎人工智能也许能消除贫困

translation.en: give us new medicines,
translation.zh: ‎为我们提供新药

translation.en: and make our world even more peaceful.
translation.zh: ‎让我们的世界更加和平

translation.en: [man 1] Nice work.
translation.zh: ‎做得好

translation.en: [woman 1] But there are so many risks along the way.
translation.zh: ‎但同时 这条道路上也危机重重

translation.en: With AI, we are essentially creating a non-human intelligence
translation.zh:
‎通过人工智能 我们实质上
‎是在创造一种难以预测的

translation.en: that is very unpredictable.
translation.zh: ‎非人类的智能

translation.en: As it gets more powerful,
translation.zh: ‎随着它变得越来越强大

translation.en: where are the red lines we're going to draw with AI,
translation.zh: ‎我们想要使用还是不使用人工智能

translation.en: in terms of how we want to use it, or not use it?
translation.zh: ‎这条红线该如何界定？

translation.en: There is no place that is ground zero for this conversation
translation.zh: ‎没有哪个领域比军事应用

translation.en: more than military applications.
translation.zh: ‎更适合开启这一讨论了

translation.en: The battlefield has now become the province of software and hardware.
translation.zh:
‎如今的战场
‎已经转移到了软件和硬件的领域

translation.en: [man 1] Target has been acquired…
translation.zh: ‎目标已锁定…

translation.en: [woman 1] And militaries are racing to develop AI faster than their adversaries.
translation.zh:
‎军方正在竞相开发人工智能
‎以求超越他们的对手

translation.en: [man 1] I'm dead.
translation.zh: ‎我死了

translation.en: [woman 1] We're moving towards a world where not only major militaries,
translation.zh:
‎我们正在快步进入一个新的世界
‎在这里 不仅主要的军事力量

translation.en: but non-state actors, private industries,
translation.zh: ‎就连非国家行为者、私人企业、

translation.en: or even our local police department down the street
translation.zh: ‎甚至地方警察部门

translation.en: could be able to use these weapons that can autonomously kill.
translation.zh:
‎都可以使用这些
‎具备自主杀伐能力的武器

translation.en: Will we cede the decision to take a life to algorithms, to computer software?
translation.zh:
‎我们是否会将生杀大权
‎交给算法和计算机软件？

translation.en: It's one of the most pressing issues of our time.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们这个时代最紧迫的问题之一

translation.en: And, if not used wisely,
translation.zh: ‎如果使用不当

translation.en: poses a grave risk to every single person on the planet.
translation.zh:
‎它将会对地球上的每一个人
‎构成严重的威胁

translation.en: [male voice] Good work out there, guys.
translation.zh: ‎各位 做得很好

translation.en: [tech 1] That's a wider lens than we had before.
translation.zh:
‎这比我们以前的镜头
‎取景范围宽了很多

translation.en: [man 2] Really?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？

translation.en: [tech 1] You can see a lot more data.
translation.zh: ‎你可以得到多得多的数据

translation.en: Very cool.
translation.zh: ‎太好了

translation.en: At Shield AI, we are building an AI pilot
translation.zh:
‎在Shield AI公司
‎我们正在开发一个人工智能飞行员

translation.en: that's taking self-driving, artificial intelligence technology
translation.zh: ‎将自动驾驶和人工智能技术

translation.en: and putting it on aircraft.
translation.zh: ‎运用于飞行器上

translation.en: When we talk about an AI pilot,
translation.zh: ‎说到人工智能飞行员时

translation.en: we think about giving an aircraft a higher level of autonomy.
translation.zh:
‎我们想到的是
‎赋予飞行器更高级别的自主权

translation.en: They will be solving problems on their own.
translation.zh: ‎它们将会自主解决问题

translation.en: Nova is an autonomous quadcopter
translation.zh: ‎诺瓦是一种自主四旋翼飞行器

translation.en: that explores buildings and subterranean structures
translation.zh: ‎它可以为清障部队打头阵

translation.en: ahead of clearance forces
translation.zh: ‎探索建筑物与地下结构

translation.en: to provide eyes and ears in those spaces.
translation.zh: ‎对这些地区实行监控

translation.en: You can definitely tell a ton of improvements
translation.zh: ‎与我们上一次见到的它相比

translation.en: since we saw it last.
translation.zh: ‎大家能看到许多改良

translation.en: [tech 2] We're working on some exploration changes today.
translation.zh:
‎今天我们会对一些
‎探索性的修改进行检测

translation.en: We're working a little floor-by-floor stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我们会进行逐层勘察

translation.en: It'll finish one floor, all the rooms, before going to the second.
translation.zh:
‎我们的想法是 让它先完成整层楼
‎每个房间的勘察 然后再去下一层

translation.en: -That's awesome. -We put in some changes recently…
translation.zh:
‎-太棒了
‎-我们最近对它进行了一些改进…

translation.en: A lot of people often ask me
translation.zh: ‎常常有很多人问我

translation.en: why artificial intelligence is an important capability.
translation.zh:
‎人工智能
‎为什么是一种重要的军事力量

translation.en: And I just think back to the missions that I was executing.
translation.zh: ‎我会想起我曾经执行过的那些任务

translation.en: Spent seven years in the Navy.
translation.zh: ‎我在海军服役了七年

translation.en: I was a former Navy SEAL deployed twice to Afghanistan,
translation.zh:
‎我是前海豹突击队队员
‎曾两次被派往阿富汗

translation.en: once to the Pacific Theater.
translation.zh: ‎一次被派往太平洋战场

translation.en: In a given day, we might have to clear 150 different compounds or buildings.
translation.zh:
‎一天之内 我们可能必须清理
‎150座不同的院落或建筑物

translation.en: One of the core capabilities is close-quarters combat.
translation.zh: ‎核心能力之一就是近身战斗

translation.en: Gunfighting at extremely close ranges inside buildings.
translation.zh: ‎在建筑物内进行超近距离枪战

translation.en: You are getting shot at.
translation.zh: ‎你会被子弹击中

translation.en: There are IEDs potentially inside the building.
translation.zh: ‎建筑物内也许会有简易爆炸装置

translation.en: It's the most dangerous thing that any special operations forces member,
translation.zh: ‎这是所有特种部队成员和步兵

translation.en: any infantry member, can do in a combat zone.
translation.zh: ‎在战区会面临最危险的局面

translation.en: Bar none.
translation.zh: ‎无一例外

translation.en: For the rest of my life I'll be thankful for my time in the Navy.
translation.zh:
‎我此生都会感激
‎我在海军效力的这段时光

translation.en: There are a collection of moments and memories that, when I think about,
translation.zh: ‎有很多画面和回忆 每当我想起它们

translation.en: I certainly get emotional.
translation.zh: ‎总会感慨万千

translation.en: It is cliché that freedom isn't free, but I 100% believe it.
translation.zh:
‎“自由不是免费的” 这是陈词滥调了
‎但我100%相信这句话

translation.en: [quavers] Um, I've experienced it, and it takes a lot of sacrifice.
translation.zh:
‎我亲身经历过
‎它需要无数的牺牲来换取

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: When something bad happens to one of your teammates,
translation.zh: ‎当你的某位战友遭遇不幸时

translation.en: whether they're hurt or they're killed,
translation.zh: ‎不论是受伤还是牺牲

translation.en: um, it's just a… It's a really tragic thing.
translation.zh: ‎这都是悲剧

translation.en: You know, for me now in the work that we do,
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 我们现在所做的工作

translation.en: it's motivating to um… be able to you know, reduce the number of times
translation.zh: ‎其动力来源就是减少此类悲剧

translation.en: that ever happens again.
translation.zh: ‎再次发生的概率

translation.en: [man 3] In the late 2000s,
there was this awakening inside the Defense Department
translation.zh: ‎国防部内部开始意识到

translation.en: to what you might call the accidental robotics revolution.
translation.zh:
‎一场所谓
‎“意外的机器人革命”正在发生

translation.en: We deployed thousands of air and ground robots to Iraq and Afghanistan.
translation.zh:
‎我们在伊拉克和阿富汗
‎部署了数千个空中和地面机器人

translation.en: [man 4] When I was asked by the Obama administration
translation.zh: ‎当奥巴马政府邀请我

translation.en: to become the Deputy Secretary of Defense,
translation.zh: ‎担任国防部副部长时

translation.en: the way war was fought… uh, was definitely changing.
translation.zh: ‎作战的方式正在发生改变

translation.en: Robots were used where people would have been used.
translation.zh: ‎以前用人的地方被换成了机器人

translation.en: [Paul] Early robotics systems were remote-controlled.
translation.zh: ‎早期的机器人系统都是遥控的

translation.en: There's a human driving it, steering it, like you might a remote-controlled car.
translation.zh:
‎有一个人类在驾驶、操控着它
‎就像驾驶遥控汽车一样

translation.en: [Bob] They first started generally going after improvised explosive devices,
translation.zh:
‎刚开始 它们的任务
‎一般是针对那些简易爆炸装置

translation.en: and if the bomb blew up, the robot would blow up.
translation.zh:
‎如果炸弹爆炸了
‎机器人也会随之炸毁

translation.en: Then you'd say, "That's a bummer. Okay, get out the other robot."
translation.zh:
‎然后你会说：“真是不幸
‎好吧 再拿一个机器人出来”

translation.en: [woman 2] In Afghanistan, you had the Predator drone,
translation.zh: ‎在阿富汗 有掠夺者侦察机

translation.en: and it became a very, very useful tool to conduct airstrikes.
translation.zh: ‎它变成了一种非常高效的空袭工具

translation.en: [Paul] Over time, military planners started to begin to wonder,
translation.zh:
‎随着时间的推移
‎军事规划人员们开始想：

translation.en: "What else could robots be used for?" And where was this going?
translation.zh:
‎“机器人还能用在哪些地方？”
‎而这一趋势会发展到哪种地步？

translation.en: And one of the common themes was this trend towards greater autonomy.
translation.zh:
‎其中一个共同的主题就是
‎机器人会慢慢趋向拥有更多自主权

translation.en: [woman 2] An autonomous weapon is one that makes decisions on its own,
translation.zh: ‎自主武器能够自己做出决定

translation.en: with little to no human intervention.
translation.zh: ‎人类无需或者只需进行极少的干预

translation.en: So it has an independent capacity, and it's self-directed.
translation.zh:
‎因此 它是具有
‎独立能力且能自我导向的

translation.en: And whether it can kill depends on whether it's armed or not.
translation.zh: ‎它能否杀敌取决于它是否配备了武器

translation.en: [Bob] When you have more and more autonomy in your entire system,
translation.zh: ‎当你的整个系统自主程度越来越高时

translation.en: everything starts to move at a higher clock speed.
translation.zh: ‎一切就会开始以更快的速度运转

translation.en: And when you operate at a faster pace than your adversaries,
translation.zh: ‎而当你的行动速度超过你的对手时

translation.en: that is an extraordinarily big advantage in battle.
translation.zh: ‎这在战场上是一项无与伦比的优势

translation.en: [man 5] What we focus on as it relates to autonomy
translation.zh: ‎关于自主性 我们的焦点

translation.en: is highly resilient intelligence systems.
translation.zh: ‎在于高度弹性的智能系统

translation.en: Systems that can read and react based on their environment,
translation.zh:
‎这些系统能够根据环境
‎读取信息并做出反应

translation.en: and make decisions about how to maneuver in that world.
translation.zh:
‎同时对该如何
‎在那个环境中实施操作做出决策

translation.en: The facility that we're at today was originally built as a movie studio
translation.zh:
‎我们今天所处的这个地方
‎建造之初是作为电影工作室之用

translation.en: that was converted over
translation.zh: ‎后来进行了改造

translation.en: to enable these realistic military training environments.
translation.zh: ‎以打造出这种逼真的军事训练环境

translation.en: We are here to evaluate our AI pilot.
translation.zh:
‎我们来这儿的目的
‎是对我们的人工智能飞行员进行测评

translation.en: The mission is looking for threats. It's about clearance forces.
translation.zh:
‎它的任务是寻找威胁
‎重点是清除武装力量

translation.en: It can make a decision about how to attack that problem.
translation.zh: ‎它可以自己决定要如何解决那个问题

translation.en: [man 6] We call this "the fatal funnel." You have to come through a doorway.
translation.zh:
‎我们将这里称为“死亡狭道”
‎你必须穿过一个门道

translation.en: It's where we're most vulnerable.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们最易受到攻击的敌方

translation.en: This one looks better.
translation.zh: ‎这个看起来好一些

translation.en: [man 6] The Nova lets us know, is there a shooter behind that door,
translation.zh: ‎诺瓦会告诉我们门后的是一名枪手

translation.en: is there a family behind that door?
translation.zh: ‎还是一家平民

translation.en: It'll allow us to make better decisions and keep people out of harms way.
translation.zh:
‎它能帮我们更好地做出决策
‎并让大家远离危险

translation.en: [man 7] We use the vision sensors
translation.zh: ‎我们使用了视觉传感器

translation.en: to be able to get an understanding of what the environment looks like.
translation.zh: ‎来了解该环境的情况

translation.en: It's a multistory building.
translation.zh: ‎这是一栋多层建筑

translation.en: Here's the map.
translation.zh: ‎这是地图

translation.en: While I was exploring, here's what I saw and where I saw them.
translation.zh:
‎在探测过程中 这就是
‎我看到的内容 以及我观看的地方

translation.en: [Brandon] Person detector. That's sweet.
translation.zh: ‎人类探测器 厉害

translation.en: [man 7] One of the other sensors onboard Nova is a thermal scanner.
translation.zh: ‎诺瓦配备的另一种探测器是热扫描仪

translation.en: If that's 98.6 degrees, it probably is a human.
translation.zh: ‎如果是37摄氏度 那很可能是人类

translation.en: People are considered threats until deemed otherwise.
translation.zh:
‎除非另有解释
‎否则人类都会被视作威胁

translation.en: It is about eliminating the fog of war to make better decisions.
translation.zh:
‎它的目的是在战争中
‎拨开迷雾 以更好地做出决策

translation.en: And when we look to the future,
translation.zh: ‎当我们放眼未来时

translation.en: we're scaling out to build teams of autonomous aircraft.
translation.zh:
‎我们正在估测打造这样的
‎自主飞行器团队所需要的东西

translation.en: [man 7] With self-driving vehicles,
translation.zh: ‎对于自动驾驶汽车

translation.en: ultimately the person has said to it,
translation.zh: ‎基本上 人们得告诉它

translation.en: "I'd like you to go from point A to point B."
translation.zh: ‎“我要你从A地去往B地”

translation.en: Our systems are being asked not to go from point A to point B,
translation.zh:
‎我们的系统得到的指令
‎不是从A地去往B地

translation.en: but to achieve an objective.
translation.zh: ‎而是要达成某一目标

translation.en: It's more akin to, "I need milk."
translation.zh: ‎指令更类似于：“我需要牛奶”

translation.en: And then the robot would have to figure out what grocery store to go to,
translation.zh:
‎然后机器人
‎必须判断出该去哪间杂货店

translation.en: be able to retrieve that milk, and then bring it back.
translation.zh: ‎才能找到牛奶 然后把它带回来

translation.en: And even more so,
translation.zh: ‎甚至

translation.en: it may be more appropriately stated as, "Keep the refrigerator stocked."
translation.zh:
‎指令可以更适当地表述为：
‎“保持冰箱里食物充足”

translation.en: And so, this is a level of intelligence
translation.zh: ‎而这种级别的智能

translation.en: in terms to figuring out what we need and how we do it.
translation.zh:
‎就需要弄清楚我们需要什么
‎以及我们需要怎么做

translation.en: And if there is a challenge, or a problem,
translation.zh: ‎如果遇到挑战 或者有问题

translation.en: or an issue arises, figure out how to mitigate that.
translation.zh:
‎或者遇到了麻烦
‎就要想办法缓解那种情况

translation.en: [Brandon] When I had made the decision to leave the Navy, I started thinking,
translation.zh: ‎在决定从海军退役后 我开始考虑：

translation.en: "Okay. Well, what's next?"
translation.zh: ‎“好吧 接下来要做什么？”

translation.en: I grew up with the Internet. Saw what it became.
translation.zh:
‎我从小就是伴着网络长大的
‎我见证了它的变迁

translation.en: And part of the conclusion that I had reached was…
translation.zh: ‎而我得到的其中一个结论是…

translation.en: AI in 2015
translation.zh: ‎2015年的人工智能

translation.en: was really where the Internet was in 1991.
translation.zh: ‎就相当于是1991年的互联网

translation.en: And AI was poised to take off
translation.zh: ‎人工智能已经蓄势待发

translation.en: and be one of the most powerful technologies in the world.
translation.zh: ‎它将成为世界上最强大的技术

translation.en: Working with it every single day, I can see the progress that is being made.
translation.zh:
‎每天的工作都与人工智能为伴
‎我可以看到它在不断进步

translation.en: But for a lot of people, when they think "AI,"
translation.zh: ‎但对于很多人来说 提到“人工智能”

translation.en: their minds immediately go to Hollywood.
translation.zh: ‎他们就会立刻联想到好莱坞

translation.en: [computer voice] Shall we play a game?
translation.zh: ‎我们要玩游戏吗？

translation.en: How about Global Thermonuclear War?
translation.zh: ‎《全球热核战争》怎么样？

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: [man 8] When people think of artificial intelligence generally,
translation.zh: ‎一般 当人们想到人工智能时

translation.en: they might think of The Terminator. Or I, Robot.
translation.zh:
‎大家或许会想到
‎《终结者》或者《我，机器人》

translation.en: Deactivate.
translation.zh: ‎停止运行

translation.en: What am I?
translation.zh: ‎我是什么？

translation.en: [man 8] Or The Matrix.
translation.zh: ‎或者《黑客帝国》

translation.en: Based on what you see in the sci-fi movies,
translation.zh: ‎根据你在科幻电影里看到的内容

translation.en: how do you know I'm a human? I could just be computer generated AI.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么知道我是人类？
‎我可能只是计算机生成的人工智能

translation.en: Replicants are like any other machine. They're either a benefit or a hazard.
translation.zh:
‎复制人和其他所有机器人一样
‎它们要么于人有利 要么祸害无穷

translation.en: [Andrew] But there's all sorts of more primitive AIs,
translation.zh: ‎但还有各种较原始的人工智能

translation.en: that are still going to change our lives
translation.zh: ‎在我们发展到

translation.en: well before we reach the thinking, talking robot stage.
translation.zh:
‎有思考和交流能力的机器人阶段前
‎它们也会为我们的生活带来变化

translation.en: [woman 3] The robots are here. The robots are making decisions.
translation.zh:
‎机器人已经出现
‎机器人正在负责决策

translation.en: The robot revolution has arrived,
translation.zh: ‎机器人革命已经到来

translation.en: it's just that it doesn't look like what anybody imagined.
translation.zh: ‎只是它跟大家想象的情况有所出入

translation.en: [film character] Terminator's an infiltration unit. Part man, part machine.
translation.zh: ‎终结者是一个融合体 半人半机器

translation.en: [man 9] We're not talking about a Terminator-style killer robot.
translation.zh:
‎我们说的不是一个
‎像终结者那样的杀人机器人

translation.en: We're talking about AI that can do some tasks that humans can do.
translation.zh:
‎我们说的是能够完成一些
‎人类能完成的任务的人工智能

translation.en: But the concern is whether these systems are reliable.
translation.zh: ‎但问题在于 这些系统是否可靠

translation.en: [reporter 1] New details in last night's crash involving a self-driving Uber SUV.
translation.zh:
‎昨晚优步自动驾驶休旅车
‎致命车祸的最新细节

translation.en: The company created an artificial intelligence chatbot.
translation.zh: ‎公司开发了一款人工智能聊天机器人

translation.en: She took on a rather racist tone…
translation.zh: ‎她带着颇具种族主义色彩的口吻…

translation.en: [reporter 2] Twenty-six state legislators falsely identified as criminals.
translation.zh: ‎26名州议员被错误地认定为罪犯

translation.en: The question is whether they can handle the complexities of the real world.
translation.zh:
‎问题在于 它们能否应付
‎真实世界的错综复杂

translation.en: [man 10] The physical world is really messy.
translation.zh: ‎物质世界错综复杂

translation.en: There are many things that we don't know,
translation.zh: ‎有很多事情我们并不了解

translation.en: making it much harder to train AI systems.
translation.zh: ‎这让训练人工智能系统变得愈发困难

translation.en: That is where machine learning systems have started to come in.
translation.zh:
‎这就是机器学习系统
‎开始发挥作用的地方

translation.en: [man 11] Machine learning has been a huge advancement
translation.zh: ‎机器学习是一个巨大的进步

translation.en: because it means that we don't have to teach computers everything.
translation.zh:
‎因为它意味着
‎我们无需教会计算机所有东西

translation.en: You actually give a computer millions of pieces of information,
translation.zh:
‎实际上 你是将
‎数百万条信息交给计算机

translation.en: and the machine begins to learn.
translation.zh: ‎然后机器开始自己学习

translation.en: And that could be applied to anything.
translation.zh: ‎这可以应用于任何事情

translation.en: [Pulkit] Our Robot Dog project, we are trying to show
translation.zh: ‎在机器狗项目中 我们想要展示的是

translation.en: that our dog can walk across many, many diverse terrains.
translation.zh:
‎我们的机器狗
‎可以在许多不同的地形上面行走

translation.en: Humans have evolved over billions of years to walk,
translation.zh: ‎人类经过数十亿年的进化才学会走路

translation.en: but there's a lot of intelligence in adapting to these different terrains.
translation.zh:
‎但适应这些不同的地形
‎牵涉到了许多的智能

translation.en: The question remains for robotic systems is,
translation.zh: ‎对机器人系统来说 尚存的问题是

translation.en: could they also adapt like animals and humans?
translation.zh:
‎它们能否
‎像动物和人类一样适应环境？

translation.en: With machine learning,
translation.zh: ‎通过机器学习

translation.en: we collect lots and lots of data in simulation.
translation.zh:
‎我们在模拟过程中
‎收集到了海量的数据

translation.en: A simulation is a digital twin of reality.
translation.zh: ‎模拟是现实的数字化孪生体

translation.en: We can have many instances of that reality running on different computers.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以在不同的计算机上
‎运行某种现实情况的许多实例

translation.en: It samples thousands of actions in simulation.
translation.zh:
‎它在模拟中
‎对数以千计的动作进行采样

translation.en: The ground that they're encountering has different slipperiness.
translation.zh: ‎它们遇到的地面具有不同的滑度

translation.en: It has different softness.
translation.zh: ‎它们有不同的柔软度

translation.en: We take all the experience of these thousands of robots
translation.zh:
‎我们将从模拟中得到
‎这数千个机器人的所有经验

translation.en: from simulation and download this into a real robotic system.
translation.zh: ‎下载到真正的机器人系统中

translation.en: The test we're going to do today is to see if it can adapt to new terrains.
translation.zh:
‎我们今天要测试的内容
‎是看看它能否适应新的地面

translation.en: When the robot was going over foam,
translation.zh: ‎当机器人要通过一片泡沫时

translation.en: the feet movements were stomping on the ground.
translation.zh: ‎其脚部的动作是在地面上跺踩

translation.en: Versus when it came on this poly surface,
translation.zh: ‎而当它来到这片聚合材料表面时

translation.en: it was trying to adjust the motion, so it doesn't slip.
translation.zh: ‎它会努力调整动作 以防止打滑

translation.en: Then that is when it strikes you,
translation.zh: ‎而这正是让你震惊的时候

translation.en: "This is what machine learning is bringing to the table."
translation.zh: ‎“这就是机器学习带来的效果”

translation.en: We think the Robot Dog could be really helpful
translation.zh: ‎我们认为机器狗

translation.en: in disaster response scenarios
translation.zh: ‎在需要穿越许多不同地形的

translation.en: where you need to navigate many different kinds of terrain.
translation.zh: ‎灾难应对场景中会发挥巨大的作用

translation.en: Or putting these dogs to do surveillance in harsh environments.
translation.zh:
‎我们也可以让这些机器狗
‎去严酷的环境中进行监视

translation.en: But most technology runs into the challenge
translation.zh: ‎但大部分的技术都会遇到一项挑战

translation.en: that there is some good they can do, and there's some bad.
translation.zh: ‎那就是 它们可以行善 也可以作恶

translation.en: For example, we can use nuclear technology for energy…
translation.zh: ‎比如 我们可以利用核技术供能…

translation.en: but we also could develop atom bombs which are really bad.
translation.zh:
‎但我们也可以开发出
‎非常邪恶的原子弹

translation.en: This is what is known as the dual-use problem.
translation.zh: ‎这就是所谓的双刃剑问题

translation.en: Fire is dual-use.
translation.zh: ‎火是一把双刃剑

translation.en: Human intelligence is dual-use.
translation.zh: ‎人类智慧也是双刃剑

translation.en: So, needless to say, artificial intelligence is also dual-use.
translation.zh:
‎所以不用说
‎人工智能同样是把双刃剑

translation.en: It's really important to think about AI used in context
translation.zh:
‎考虑人工智能的使用环境
‎是非常重要的

translation.en: because, yes, it's terrific to have a search-and-rescue robot
translation.zh: ‎因为 没错 能有一个搜救机器人

translation.en: that can help locate somebody after an avalanche,
translation.zh: ‎在雪崩后帮忙搜救是件非常好的事

translation.en: but that same robot can be weaponized.
translation.zh: ‎但这同一个机器人也可以被武器化

translation.en: [Pulkit] When you see companies using robotics for putting armed weapons on them,
translation.zh: ‎当看到有些公司给机器人装备武器时

translation.en: a part of you becomes mad.
translation.zh: ‎你会感到愤怒

translation.en: And a part of it is the realization that when we put our technology,
translation.zh:
‎同时我们也会意识到
‎当我们把我们的技术投放出去时

translation.en: this is what's going to happen.
translation.zh: ‎这种情况就注定会发生

translation.en: [woman 4] This is a real transformative technology.
translation.zh: ‎这是一项真正的变革性技术

translation.en: These are weapon systems
translation.zh: ‎这些武器系统

translation.en: that could actually change our safety and security in a dramatic way.
translation.zh: ‎可以为我们的安全和安保带来巨变

translation.en: As of now, we are not sure that machines can actually make
translation.zh: ‎目前 我们并不确定这些机器真的能

translation.en: the distinction between civilians and combatants.
translation.zh: ‎区分平民与士兵

translation.en: [Paul] Early in the war in Afghanistan, I was part of an Army Ranger sniper team
translation.zh:
‎阿富汗战争早期
‎我是陆军游骑兵狙击队的一员

translation.en: looking for enemy fighters coming across the border.
translation.zh:
‎我们的任务是寻找
‎越过边界的敌方战斗人员

translation.en: And they sent a little girl to scout out our position.
translation.zh:
‎他们派了一个小女孩
‎来侦察我们的位置

translation.en: One thing that never came up was the idea of shooting this girl.
translation.zh: ‎我从没想过要开枪射杀这个小女孩

translation.en: Under the laws of war, that would have been legal.
translation.zh: ‎根据战争法 那其实是合法的

translation.en: They don't set an age for enemy combatants.
translation.zh: ‎他们并没有规定敌方战斗人员的年龄

translation.en: If you built a robot to comply perfectly with the law of war,
translation.zh:
‎如果你开发了一个
‎完全遵照战争法行事的机器人

translation.en: it would have shot this little girl.
translation.zh: ‎它一定会将那个小女孩射杀

translation.en: How would a robot know the difference between what's legal and what is right?
translation.zh:
‎机器人怎么能够区分
‎什么是合法的 而什么是正确的？

translation.en: [man 12] When it comes to autonomous drone warfare,
translation.zh: ‎谈到自主无人机战争时

translation.en: they wanna take away the harm that it places on American soldiers
translation.zh: ‎他们想要减少对美国士兵

translation.en: and the American psyche,
translation.zh: ‎和美国人心理造成的伤害

translation.en: uh, but the increase on civilian harm ends up with Afghans,
translation.zh:
‎但最终却导致了
‎对阿富汗、伊拉克、索马里平民

translation.en: and Iraqis, and Somalians.
translation.zh: ‎的伤害剧增

translation.en: I would really ask those who support trusting AI to be used in drones,
translation.zh:
‎我真的想问问那些
‎支持将人工智能用于无人机的人：

translation.en: "What if your village was on the receiving end of that?"
translation.zh:
‎“如果你们的村庄成为了
‎受攻击的目标 你们作何感想？”

translation.en: [man 13] AI is a dual-edged sword.
translation.zh: ‎人工智能是一把双刃剑

translation.en: It can be used for good, which is what we'd use it for ordinarily,
translation.zh:
‎它可以用来做好事
‎这也是我们通常的做法

translation.en: and at the flip of a switch,
translation.zh: ‎但只要轻轻按下开关

translation.en: the technology becomes potentially something that could be lethal.
translation.zh: ‎这项技术就可能会变成致命的东西

translation.en: I'm a clinical pharmacologist.
translation.zh: ‎我是一名临床药理学家

translation.en: I have a team of people
translation.zh: ‎我们的团队

translation.en: that are using artificial intelligence to figure out drugs
translation.zh: ‎在利用人工智能研发药物

translation.en: that will cure diseases that are not getting any attention.
translation.zh: ‎以治疗那些没有受到任何关注的疾病

translation.en: It used to be with drug discoveries, you would take a molecule that existed,
translation.zh:
‎过去 新药研发的过程是
‎你用一个已经存在的分子

translation.en: and do a tweak to that to get to a new drug.
translation.zh: ‎对其进行微调 然后得到一种新药

translation.en: And now we've developed AI that can feed us with millions of ideas,
translation.zh:
‎现在 我们开发的人工智能
‎可以为我们提供无数种思路

translation.en: millions of molecules,
translation.zh: ‎无数种分子

translation.en: and that opens up so many possibilities
translation.zh: ‎这为我们治疗以前无法治疗的疾病

translation.en: for treating diseases we've never been able to treat previously.
translation.zh: ‎开辟了许多的可能性

translation.en: But there's definitely a dark side that I never have thought
translation.zh:
‎但这其中确实有一个
‎我从没想过自己会触及的

translation.en: that I would go to.
translation.zh: ‎阴暗面

translation.en: This whole thing started when I was invited
translation.zh: ‎事情始于

translation.en: by an organization out of Switzerland called the Spiez Laboratory
translation.zh: ‎一个名叫施皮茨实验室的瑞士机构

translation.en: to give a presentation on the potential misuse of AI.
translation.zh:
‎邀请我就“人工智能潜在的滥用问题”
‎做一次演讲

translation.en: [man 14] Sean just sent me an email with a few ideas
translation.zh: ‎西恩给我发了一封邮件

translation.en: of some ways we could misuse our own artificial intelligence.
translation.zh:
‎列举了几种
‎可能会滥用人工智能的情况

translation.en: And instead of asking our model to create drug-like molecules,
translation.zh:
‎与其要求模型
‎创造出能用于疾病治疗的

translation.en: that could be used to treat diseases,
translation.zh: ‎类药分子

translation.en: let's see if we can generate the most toxic molecules possible.
translation.zh:
‎我们来看看
‎它能否生成毒性最强的分子吧

translation.en: [Sean] I wanted to make the point, could we use AI technology
translation.zh:
‎我就是想说明 ‎我们能否利用人工智能技术
‎设计出致命的分子结构？

translation.en: to design molecules that were deadly?
translation.zh:
‎我们能否利用人工智能技术
‎设计出致命的分子结构？

translation.en: [Fabio] And to be honest, we thought it was going to fail
translation.zh: ‎老实说 我们以为这并不会成功

translation.en: because all we really did was flip this zero to a one.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们只是把某个“0”改成了“1”

translation.en: And by inverting it, instead of driving away from toxicity,
translation.zh: ‎通过反向设置 我们不再是避免毒性

translation.en: now we're driving towards toxicity.
translation.zh: ‎而是寻求毒性

translation.en: And that's it.
translation.zh: ‎就这么简单

translation.en: While I was home, the computer was doing the work.
translation.zh: ‎我在家的时候 计算机在奋力工作

translation.en: I mean, it was cranking through, generating thousands of molecules,
translation.zh: ‎它运转着 产生了成千上万个分子

translation.en: and we didn't have to do anything other than just push "go."
translation.zh:
‎而除了点击“开始”
‎我们什么都不用做

translation.en: [Fabio] The next morning, there was this file on my computer,
translation.zh:
‎第二天早上
‎我的计算机上出现了一个文档

translation.en: and within it were roughly 40,000 molecules
translation.zh: ‎里面大约有四万个分子

translation.en: that were potentially
translation.zh: ‎它们可能是

translation.en: some of the most toxic molecules known to humankind.
translation.zh: ‎人类已知毒性最强的分子

translation.en: [Sean] The hairs on the back of my neck stood up on end.
translation.zh: ‎我脖子上的汗毛全都竖了起来

translation.en: I was blown away.
translation.zh: ‎我被惊呆了

translation.en: The computer made tens of thousands of ideas
translation.zh: ‎计算机为新的化学武器

translation.en: for new chemical weapons.
translation.zh: ‎提出了数以万计种想法

translation.en: Obviously, we have molecules that look like and are VX analogs and VX
translation.zh: ‎显然 在我们的数据组中有VX类似物

translation.en: in the data set.
translation.zh: ‎以及VX分子

translation.en: VX is one of the most potent chemical weapons in the world.
translation.zh: ‎VX是世界上最强效的化学武器之一

translation.en: [reporter 3] New claims from police
translation.zh: ‎警方的最新通报称

translation.en: that the women seen attacking Kim Jong-nam in this airport assassination
translation.zh:
‎在这起机场暗杀事件中
‎袭击金正男的女性

translation.en: were using a deadly nerve agent called VX.
translation.zh: ‎使用的是一种名为VX的致命神经毒剂

translation.en: [Sean] It can cause death through asphyxiation.
translation.zh: ‎它可以导致窒息性死亡

translation.en: This is a very potent molecule,
translation.zh: ‎这是一种非常强效的分子

translation.en: and most of these molecules were predicted to be even more deadly than VX.
translation.zh:
‎据预测 这些分子中
‎大部分甚至比VX更加致命

translation.en: [Fabio] Many of them had never, as far as we know, been seen before.
translation.zh:
‎据我们所知
‎其中有许多分子都是前所未见的

translation.en: And so, when Sean and I realized this, we're like, "Oh, what have we done?" [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎当西恩和我意识到这一点时
‎我们惊呼：“我们这是做了什么啊？”

translation.en: [Sean] I quickly realized that we had opened Pandora's box,
translation.zh:
‎我很快就意识到
‎我们打开了潘多拉的盒子

translation.en: and I said, "Stop. Don't do anything else. We're done."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“快停下
‎别的什么也别做 到此为止

translation.en: "Just make me the slides that I need for the presentation."
translation.zh: ‎帮我把演讲要用的幻灯片做好就行”

translation.en: When we did this experiment,
translation.zh: ‎在我们做这项试验时

translation.en: I was thinking, "What's the worst thing that could possibly happen?"
translation.zh:
‎我一直在想：
‎“最糟糕的情况会是什么？”

translation.en: But now I'm like, "We were naive. We were totally naive in doing it."
translation.zh:
‎但现在我的想法是：
‎“我们太天真了 这么做太天真了”

translation.en: The thing that terrifies me the most is that anyone could do what we did.
translation.zh:
‎最让我害怕的是
‎任何人都可以做我们做的这件事

translation.en: All it takes is the flip of a switch.
translation.zh: ‎你只需要轻轻按一下开关就行

translation.en: How do we control this technology before it's used
translation.zh: ‎我们该如何在这项技术被用于

translation.en: potentially to do something that's utterly destructive?
translation.zh:
‎可能会造成毁灭性破坏的用途之前
‎对它加以控制？

translation.en: [woman 1] At the heart of the conversation around artificial intelligence
translation.zh: ‎在围绕人工智能

translation.en: and how do we choose to use it in society
translation.zh:
‎以及我们要如何
‎在社会中使用它的对话中

translation.en: is a race between the power, with which we develop technologies,
translation.zh:
‎其核心是一场竞赛
‎即我们开发技术的力量

translation.en: and the wisdom that we have to govern it.
translation.zh: ‎与我们管理它的智慧之间的竞赛

translation.en: There are the obvious moral and ethical implications
translation.zh: ‎这明显和赋予我们的智能手机

translation.en: of the same thing that powers our smartphones
translation.zh: ‎去决定是否要夺取一条生命的权利

translation.en: being entrusted with the moral decision to take a life.
translation.zh: ‎具有相同的道德和伦理问题

translation.en: I work with the Future Of Life Institute, a community of scientist activists.
translation.zh:
‎我就职于生命未来研究所
‎一个科学界的社会活动家群体

translation.en: We're overall trying to show
translation.zh: ‎我们的主要目标是展示出

translation.en: that there is this other side to speeding up and escalating automation.
translation.zh:
‎加速和升级自动化
‎还会带来另一方面的结果

translation.en: [Emilia] But we're trying to make sure that technologies we create
translation.zh: ‎我们致力于保障我们创造出来的技术

translation.en: are used in a way that is safe and ethical.
translation.zh: ‎能以安全且合乎伦理的方式被使用

translation.en: Let's have conversations about rules of engagement,
translation.zh: ‎我们来谈谈交战规则

translation.en: and codes of conduct in using AI throughout our weapons systems.
translation.zh:
‎以及在武器系统中
‎使用人工智能的行为准则吧

translation.en: Because we are now seeing "enter the battlefield" technologies
translation.zh: ‎因为我们现在已经看到了

translation.en: that can be used to kill autonomously.
translation.zh: ‎可以自主杀人的“进入战场”技术

translation.en: In 2021, the UN released a report on the potential use
translation.zh: ‎2021年 联合国发布了一份关于

translation.en: of a lethal autonomous weapon on the battlefield in Libya.
translation.zh:
‎在利比亚战场上
‎可能使用了致命自主武器的报告

translation.en: [reporter 4] A UN panel said that a drone flying in the Libyan civil war last year
translation.zh:
‎联合国的一个小组称 去年
‎在利比亚内战中使用的一架无人机

translation.en: had been programmed to attack targets autonomously.
translation.zh: ‎被编程设定为自主攻击目标

translation.en: [Emilia] If the UN reporting is accurate,
translation.zh: ‎如果联合国的报告无误

translation.en: this would be a watershed moment for humanity.
translation.zh: ‎这将是人类的一个分水岭

translation.en: Because it marks a use case
translation.zh: ‎因为这标志着一个用例

translation.en: where an AI made the decision to take a life, and not a human being.
translation.zh:
‎即人工智能代替人类
‎做出了夺取生命的决定

translation.en: [Stacie] You're seeing advanced autonomous weapons
translation.zh: ‎我们看到了先进的自主武器

translation.en: beginning to be used in different places around the globe.
translation.zh: ‎开始在全球各地被投入使用

translation.en: There were reports out of Israel.
translation.zh: ‎有来自以色列的报告

translation.en: Azerbaijan used autonomous systems to target Armenian air defenses.
translation.zh:
‎阿塞拜疆使用自主系统
‎攻击亚美尼亚的防空系统

translation.en: [Sean] It can fly around the battlefield for hours,
translation.zh: ‎它可以在战场上盘旋数小时

translation.en: looking for things to hit on its own,
translation.zh: ‎自己寻找攻击目标

translation.en: and then plow into them without any kind of human intervention.
translation.zh: ‎然后在无人干预的情况下冲向目标

translation.en: [Stacie] And we've seen recently
translation.zh: ‎近期 我们已经看到了

translation.en: these different videos that are posted in Ukraine.
translation.zh: ‎各种从乌克兰发出的视频

translation.en: [Paul] It's unclear what mode they might have been in when they were operating.
translation.zh:
‎目前还不清楚
‎它们运行时可能处于什么模式

translation.en: Was a human in the loop, choosing what targets to attack,
translation.zh: ‎是有人类介入选择攻击目标？

translation.en: or was the machine doing that on its own?
translation.zh: ‎还是机器在自主决定？

translation.en: But there will certainly come a point in time,
translation.zh:
‎但无论这是否已经在
‎利比亚、乌克兰或其他地方发生过

translation.en: whether it's already happened in Libya, Ukraine or elsewhere,
translation.zh: ‎总有一天

translation.en: where a machine makes its own decision about whom to kill on the battlefield.
translation.zh: ‎机器会在战场上自主决定它要杀死谁

translation.en: [Izumi] Machines exercising lethal power against humans
translation.zh: ‎机器在没有人类干预的情况下

translation.en: without human intervention
translation.zh: ‎对人类发起致命攻击

translation.en: is politically unacceptable, morally repugnant.
translation.zh:
‎这在政治上不可接受
‎在道德上令人反感

translation.en: Whether the international community
translation.zh: ‎国际社会

translation.en: will be sufficient to govern those challenges
translation.zh: ‎是否有能力应对这些挑战

translation.en: is a big question mark.
translation.zh: ‎目前还是一个巨大的问号

translation.en: [Emilia] If we look towards the future, even just a few years from now,
translation.zh:
‎如果我们放眼未来
‎哪怕只是短短几年后

translation.en: what the landscape looks like is very scary,
translation.zh: ‎形势的发展也十分骇人听闻

translation.en: given that the amount of capital and human resource
translation.zh: ‎为了让人工智能变得更强大

translation.en: going into making AI more powerful
translation.zh: ‎以及将它应用到各种不同领域

translation.en: and using it for all of these different applications,
translation.zh: ‎所投入的资金与人力

translation.en: is immense.
translation.zh: ‎相当巨大

translation.en: Oh my God, this guy.
translation.zh: ‎我的妈 这家伙

translation.en: [Brandon] He knows he can't win.
translation.zh: ‎他知道自己赢不了

translation.en: When I see AI win at different problems, I find it inspirational.
translation.zh:
‎当我看到人工智能在不同的问题中
‎取得胜利时 我会觉得备受鼓舞

translation.en: Going for a little Hail Mary action.
translation.zh: ‎孤注一掷

translation.en: And you can apply those same tactics, techniques, procedures to real aircraft.
translation.zh:
‎你可以把同样的战术、技术
‎以及程序应用在真正的飞行器上

translation.en: -[friend] Good game. -[Brandon] All right, good game. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎表现不错 ‎好了 表现不错

translation.en: It's surprising to me
translation.zh: ‎我觉得很诧异

translation.en: that people continue to make statements about what AI can't do. Right?
translation.zh:
‎人们不断地发表言论
‎说人工智能做不到某件事情 是吧？

translation.en: "Oh, it'll never be able to beat a world champion in chess."
translation.zh:
‎“哦 它永远都不可能
‎战胜国际象棋世界冠军的”

translation.en: [reporter 5] An IBM computer has made a comeback
translation.zh: ‎一台IBM电脑在与世界象棋冠军

translation.en: in Game 2 of its match with world chess champion, Garry Kasparov.
translation.zh:
‎加里卡斯帕罗夫的
‎第二轮对战中一雪前耻

translation.en: [commentator] Whoa! Kasparov has resigned!
translation.zh: ‎卡斯帕罗夫弃局了！

translation.en: [Kasporov] When I see something that is well beyond my understanding,
translation.zh: ‎当我看到一些超出我理解范围的事时

translation.en: I'm scared. And that was something well beyond my understanding.
translation.zh:
‎我会害怕
‎而那远超出了我的理解范围

translation.en: [Brandon] And then people would say,
translation.zh: ‎然后人们会说：

translation.en: "It'll never be able to beat a world champion in the game of Go."
translation.zh: ‎“它永远都不可能战胜围棋世界冠军”

translation.en: [Go champion] I believe human intuition is still too advanced for A.I.
translation.zh:
‎我相信人类的直觉
‎对人工智能来说还是过于先进

translation.en: to have caught up.
translation.zh: ‎难以赶超

translation.en: [man 15] Go is one of the most complicated games anyone can learn
translation.zh:
‎围棋是人类
‎能够学会的最复杂的游戏之一

translation.en: because the number of moves on the board, when you do the math,
translation.zh: ‎稍经计算 棋盘上可能的落子方法

translation.en: equal more atoms than there are in the entire universe.
translation.zh: ‎比整个宇宙中的原子数还要多

translation.en: There was a team at Google called DeepMind,
translation.zh: ‎谷歌有一个团队名叫“深度思维”

translation.en: and they created a program called AlphaGo
translation.zh: ‎他们开发了一个叫“阿尔法狗”的程序

translation.en: to be able to beat the world's best players.
translation.zh: ‎它能打败世界顶尖的棋手

translation.en: Congratulations to…
translation.zh: ‎恭喜…

translation.en: -AlphaGo -AlphaGo.
translation.zh:
‎-阿尔法狗
‎-阿尔法狗

translation.en: A computer program has just beaten a 9 dan professional.
translation.zh: ‎计算机程序刚刚战胜了九段职业棋手

translation.en: [Brandon] Then DeepMind chose StarCraft as kind of their next AI challenge.
translation.zh:
‎之后“深度思维”选择了《星际争霸》
‎作为他们的下一项人工智能挑战

translation.en: StarCraft is perhaps the most popular real-time strategy game of all time.
translation.zh:
‎《星际争霸》也许是
‎史上最流行的即时策略游戏

translation.en: AlphaStar became famous when it started defeating world champions.
translation.zh:
‎战胜了世界冠军后
‎“阿尔法星”开始声名大噪

translation.en: [host 1] AlphaStar absolutely smashing Immortal Arc.
translation.zh: ‎“阿尔法星”暴击“不朽之弧”

translation.en: [host 2] Know what?
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？

translation.en: This is not gonna be a fight that the pros can win.
translation.zh: ‎职业玩家赢不了这场比赛

translation.en: It's kind of ridiculous.
translation.zh: ‎这挺荒谬的

translation.en: [Brandon] Professional gamers say, "I would never try that tactic."
translation.zh:
‎职业玩家们都在说：
‎“我永远不会尝试那种策略

translation.en: "I would never try that strategy. That's something that's not human."
translation.zh:
‎我永远不会尝试那种战略
‎那不是人干的事”

translation.en: And that was perhaps, you know, the "a-ha" moment for me.
translation.zh:
‎对我来说
‎那也许就是灵光乍现的时刻

translation.en: I came to realize the time is now.
translation.zh: ‎我意识到时机到了

translation.en: There's an important technology and an opportunity to make a difference.
translation.zh: ‎改变世界的重要技术和时机已经出现

translation.en: I only knew the problems that I had faced as a SEAL in close-quarters combat,
translation.zh:
‎我只了解我作为海豹突击队员时
‎在近距离战斗中遇到过的问题

translation.en: but one of my good friends, who was an F-18 pilot, told me,
translation.zh:
‎但我的一个曾是
‎F-18飞行员的好朋友告诉我：

translation.en: "We have the same problem in the fighter jet community."
translation.zh:
‎“我们在战斗机领域
‎也遇到了同样的问题

translation.en: "They are jamming communications."
translation.zh: ‎他们会干扰通讯

translation.en: "There are proliferated surface-to-air missile sites
translation.zh: ‎地对空导弹基地的数量激增

translation.en: that make it too dangerous to operate."
translation.zh: ‎导致危险系数过高 无法行动”

translation.en: Imagine if we had a fighter jet that was commanded by an AI.
translation.zh:
‎想象一下如果我们有一架
‎由人工智能控制的战斗机

translation.en: [host 3] Welcome to the AlphaDogfights.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎参加“阿尔法缠斗”测试

translation.en: We're a couple of minutes away from this first semifinal.
translation.zh: ‎距离上半场比赛还有几分钟时间

translation.en: [Brandon] DARPA, the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency,
translation.zh: ‎DARPA 美国国防高级研究计划局

translation.en: had seen AlphaGo and AlphaStar,
translation.zh: ‎已经见识过“阿尔法狗”和“阿尔法星”

translation.en: and so this idea of the AlphaDogfight competition came to life.
translation.zh:
‎所以“阿尔法缠斗大赛”
‎这一想法也变成了现实

translation.en: [host 4] It's what you wanna see your fighter pilots do.
translation.zh:
‎这是你希望
‎人类战斗机飞行员能够做到的事

translation.en: [host 3] This looks like human dogfighting.
translation.zh: ‎这看起来很像人类在缠斗

translation.en: [Brandon] Dogfighting is fighter-on-fighter aircraft going at it.
translation.zh: ‎缠斗是战斗机与战斗机的对决

translation.en: You can think about it as a boxing match in the sky.
translation.zh: ‎你可以把它视为在空中的拳击赛

translation.en: Maybe people have seen the movie Top Gun.
translation.zh: ‎大家也许看过《壮志凌云》这部电影

translation.en: -[character] Can we outrun these guys? -[Maverick] Not their missiles and guns.
translation.zh: ‎我们斗得过他们吗？ ‎斗不过他们的导弹和枪支

translation.en: [character] It's a dogfight.
translation.zh: ‎那只能缠斗咯

translation.en: [Brandon] Learning to master dogfighting can take eight to ten years.
translation.zh: ‎成为缠斗高手可能需要八到十年

translation.en: It's an extremely complex challenge to build AI around.
translation.zh:
‎以此为目标开发一个人工智能
‎是一项极其复杂的挑战

translation.en: The prior approaches to autonomy and dogfighting tended to be brittle.
translation.zh:
‎早期的自主飞行
‎与缠斗策略往往十分脆弱

translation.en: [man 16] We figured machine learning was probably the way to solve this problem.
translation.zh:
‎我们认为机器学习
‎也许正是解决这个问题的方法

translation.en: At first, the AI knew nothing about the world in which it was dropped.
translation.zh:
‎起初 人工智能
‎对自己所处的环境一无所知

translation.en: It didn't know it was flying or what dogfighting was.
translation.zh:
‎它不知道它在飞行
‎也不知道缠斗为何物

translation.en: It didn't know what an F-16 is.
translation.zh: ‎它不知道F-16是什么

translation.en: All it knew was the available actions it could take,
translation.zh: ‎它只知道它可以采取的行动

translation.en: and it would start to randomly explore those actions.
translation.zh: ‎它会开始随机地探索尝试

translation.en: [colleague] The blue plane's been training for only a small amount of time.
translation.zh: ‎蓝色飞机只接受过极短时间的训练

translation.en: You can see it wobbling back and forth,
translation.zh: ‎你能看到它在来回摆动

translation.en: uh, flying very erratically, generally away from its adversary.
translation.zh: ‎飞行极其不稳定 离它的对手很远

translation.en: As the fight progresses, we can see blue is starting
translation.zh:
‎随着战斗持续进行 ‎我们可以看到
‎蓝色飞机开始制定它自己的作战计划

translation.en: to establish here its game plan.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以看到
‎蓝色飞机开始制定它自己的作战计划

translation.en: It's more in a position to shoot.
translation.zh: ‎射击位置更合理了

translation.en: Once in a while, the learning algorithm said,
translation.zh: ‎每隔一段时间 学习算法就会说：

translation.en: "Here's a cookie. Keep doing more of that."
translation.zh: ‎“来块小饼干 做得好 再接再厉”

translation.en: We can take advantage of computer power and train the agents many times
translation.zh:
‎我们可以利用计算机的能力
‎对个体进行多次的

translation.en: in parallel.
translation.zh: ‎并行训练

translation.en: It's like a basketball team.
translation.zh: ‎这就像篮球队一样

translation.en: Instead of playing the same team over and over again,
translation.zh: ‎我们不再重复不断地和同一球队比赛

translation.en: you're traveling the world playing 512 different teams,
translation.zh:
‎而是环游世界
‎和512支不同的球队比赛

translation.en: all at the same time.
translation.zh: ‎而且是在同一时间内

translation.en: You can get very good, very fast.
translation.zh: ‎你可以在短时间内迅速变强

translation.en: We were able to run that simulation 24/7
translation.zh: ‎我们可以昼夜不停地进行模拟

translation.en: and get something like 30 years of pilot training time in, in 10 months.
translation.zh:
‎在十个月内
‎完成大约30年的飞行员训练

translation.en: We went from barely able to control the aircraft
translation.zh: ‎我们从勉强能够控制飞机

translation.en: to being a stone-cold assassin.
translation.zh: ‎变成了一个冷血的杀手

translation.en: Under training, we were competing only against other artificial intelligence.
translation.zh:
‎在训练时
‎我们的对手只有其他的人工智能

translation.en: But competing against humans directly was kind of the ultimate target.
translation.zh:
‎但直接与人类的对决
‎才是真正的终极目标

translation.en: My name is Mike Benitez,
translation.zh: ‎我叫迈克贝尼特斯

translation.en: I'm a Lieutenant Colonel in the U.S. Air Force.
translation.zh: ‎我是一名美国空军中校

translation.en: Been on active duty about 25 years.
translation.zh: ‎至今已服役25年

translation.en: I've got 250 combat missions
translation.zh: ‎我参加过250次战斗任务

translation.en: and I'm a weapons school graduate,
translation.zh: ‎我毕业于武器学校

translation.en: which is Air Force version of Top Gun.
translation.zh: ‎也就是空军版的《壮志凌云》

translation.en: I've never actually flown against AI.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没有和人工智能在空中交过战

translation.en: So I'm pretty excited to see how well I can do.
translation.zh: ‎我很期待看看自己的表现

translation.en: [commander] We got now a 6,000 feet offensive set up nose-to-nose.
translation.zh:
‎现在的距离是1800米
‎两机面对面准备交锋

translation.en: Fight's on.
translation.zh: ‎战斗开始了

translation.en: He's gone now.
translation.zh: ‎他不见了

translation.en: Yeah, that's actually really interesting.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 这还挺有意思的

translation.en: Dead. Got him. Flawless victory.
translation.zh:
‎-死了
‎-打中他了 完胜

translation.en: All right, round two.
translation.zh: ‎好的 第二回合

translation.en: What the artificial intelligence is doing is maneuvering with such precision,
translation.zh: ‎人工智能的操作精确无比

translation.en: uh, that I just can't keep up with it.
translation.zh: ‎我完全跟不上它的节奏

translation.en: Right into the merge.
translation.zh: ‎进入交战状态

translation.en: Oh, now you're gone.
translation.zh: ‎这下你完了

translation.en: Got him!
translation.zh: ‎击中他了！

translation.en: Still got me.
translation.zh: ‎我又被击中了

translation.en: [Brett] AI is never scared.
translation.zh: ‎人工智能无所畏惧

translation.en: There's a human emotional element in the cockpit an AI won't have.
translation.zh:
‎驾驶舱里存在
‎人工智能所不具备的人类情感

translation.en: One of the more interesting strategies our AI developed,
translation.zh:
‎我们的人工智能
‎研究出了一种更有趣的战略

translation.en: was what we call the face shot.
translation.zh: ‎我们称之为“打脸”

translation.en: Usually a human wants to shoot from behind
translation.zh: ‎人类通常会想要从后面射击

translation.en: because it's hard for them to shake you loose.
translation.zh: ‎因为对方会很难闪避

translation.en: They don't try face shots because you're playing a game of chicken.
translation.zh:
‎他们不会尝试正面射击
‎因为这就是在玩“胆小鬼博弈”

translation.en: When we come head-on, 3,000 feet away to 500 feet away
translation.zh: ‎当我们相向飞行 从900米到150米

translation.en: can happen in a blink of an eye.
translation.zh: ‎可能只是眨眼之间

translation.en: You run a high risk of colliding, so humans don't try it.
translation.zh:
‎撞机的概率很高
‎所以人类不会这样尝试

translation.en: The AI, unless it's told to fear death, will not fear death.
translation.zh:
‎而人工智能不会怕死
‎除非我们给它怕死的指令

translation.en: [Mike] All good. Feels like I'm fighting against a human, uh,
translation.zh: ‎感觉像是在和人类对战

translation.en: a human that has a reckless abandonment for safety. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎不过是个完全不顾安危的人类

translation.en: He's not gonna survive this last one.
translation.zh: ‎最后这一下他逃不了了

translation.en: He doesn't have enough time.
translation.zh: ‎他不够时间反应

translation.en: [Brett] Good night.
translation.zh: ‎晚安

translation.en: [Mike] I'm dead.
translation.zh: ‎我死了

translation.en: It's humbling to know
translation.zh: ‎知道我也许不是

translation.en: that I might not even be the best thing for this mission,
translation.zh: ‎执行这项任务的最佳选择

translation.en: and that thing could be something that replaces me one day.
translation.zh:
‎知道某一天我或许会被这玩意儿取代
‎感觉有些受挫

translation.en: [colleague] Same 6 CAV.
translation.zh: ‎同样的1830米和能见度

translation.en: One thousand offset.
[Brandon] With this AI pilot commanding fighter aircraft,
translation.zh: ‎有这个人工智能飞行员来指挥战斗机

translation.en: the winning is relentless, it's dominant.
translation.zh: ‎它会毫不留情地追求胜利

translation.en: It's not just winning by a wide range.
translation.zh: ‎这不仅仅是悬殊巨大的胜利

translation.en: It's, "Okay, how can we get that onto our aircraft?" It's that powerful.
translation.zh:
‎还是：“好吧 我们要如何把那个
‎加到我们的飞机上？” 就是这么厉害

translation.en: [Nathan] It's realistic to expect that AI will be piloting an F-16,
translation.zh:
‎让人工智能
‎驾驶F-16的期待是很现实的

translation.en: and it will not be that far out.
translation.zh: ‎而且指日可待

translation.en: [Brandon] If you're going up against an AI pilot that has a 99.99999% win rate,
translation.zh:
‎如果和一个胜率为
‎99.99999%的人工智能飞行员对决

translation.en: you don't stand a chance.
translation.zh: ‎那你毫无胜算

translation.en: When I think about one AI pilot being unbeatable,
translation.zh:
‎当想到一个人工智能飞行员
‎已经战无不胜时

translation.en: I think about what a team of 50, or 100,
translation.zh: ‎我就会想到一支由50或100个

translation.en: or 1,000 AI pilots can continue to, uh, achieve.
translation.zh:
‎或1000个人工智能飞行员
‎组成的战队能有何种成就

translation.en: Swarming is a team of highly intelligent aircraft
translation.zh:
‎“无人机战群”是一支
‎由高度智能且互相协作的飞行器

translation.en: that work with each other.
translation.zh: ‎组成的战队

translation.en: They're sharing information about what to do, how to solve a problem.
translation.zh:
‎它们会分享如何行动
‎如何解决问题的相关信息

translation.en: Swarming will be a game-changing and transformational capability
translation.zh:
‎“无人机战群”
‎将赋予我军和我们的盟军

translation.en: to our military and our allies.
translation.zh: ‎扭转乾坤的能力

translation.en: [controller] Target has been acquired, and the drones are tracking him.
translation.zh: ‎目标已锁定 无人机正在追踪他

translation.en: [controller] Here comes the land.
translation.zh: ‎好的 准备降落

translation.en: [man 17] Primary goal of the swarming research we're working on
translation.zh:
‎我们目前对无人机战群的研究
‎首要目标

translation.en: is to deploy a large number of drones
translation.zh: ‎是将大量的无人机部署到

translation.en: over an area that is hard to get to or dangerous to get to.
translation.zh: ‎一个人力难及或高危区域的上空

translation.en: The Army Research Lab has been supporting this particular research project.
translation.zh:
‎陆军研究实验室
‎一直在支持着这一研究项目

translation.en: If you want to know what's in a location,
translation.zh: ‎如果你想知道某一地点里面有什么

translation.en: but it's hard to get to that area, or it's a very large area,
translation.zh:
‎但又很难抵达那个地区
‎或者该区域范围太大

translation.en: then deploying a swarm is a very natural way
translation.zh:
‎那么部署一支无人机战群
‎自然就成为了

translation.en: to extend the reach of individuals
translation.zh: ‎扩大个体搜索范围

translation.en: and collect information that is critical to the mission.
translation.zh: ‎收集任务相关重要情报的手段

translation.en: So, right now in our swarm deployment,
translation.zh: ‎目前 在我们的无人机战群部署中

translation.en: we essentially give a single command to go track the target of interest.
translation.zh:
‎我们基本上只会给出一个单一命令
‎去追踪某一特定目标

translation.en: Then the drones go and do all of that on their own.
translation.zh:
‎然后无人机
‎就会自己去完成这些所有动作

translation.en: Artificial intelligence allows the robots to move collectively as a swarm
translation.zh:
‎人工智能让机器人们
‎得以像动物集群一样以分散的方式

translation.en: in a decentralized manner.
translation.zh: ‎完成集体行动

translation.en: In the swarms in nature that we see,
translation.zh: ‎在自然界的动物集群中 我们发现

translation.en: there's no boss, no main animal telling them what to do.
translation.zh: ‎没有首领 没有发号施令的主体动物

translation.en: The behavior is emerging out of each individual animal
translation.zh:
‎这种行为是由每个动物
‎遵循着一些简单的规则

translation.en: following a few simple rules.
translation.zh: ‎最终形成的

translation.en: And out of that grows this emergent collective behavior that you see.
translation.zh:
‎大家看到的这种集体行为
‎就是这样产生的

translation.en: What's awe-inspiring about swarms in nature
translation.zh: ‎自然界的动物集群最令人惊叹的一点

translation.en: is the graceful ability in which they move.
translation.zh: ‎就是它们优雅的行动

translation.en: It's as if they were built to be a part of this group.
translation.zh: ‎仿佛它们天生就是这个群体的一部分

translation.en: Ideally, what we'd love to see with our drone swarm is,
translation.zh:
‎理想情况下
‎我们希望我们的无人机战群

translation.en: much like in the swarm in nature,
translation.zh: ‎能像自然界中的动物集群那样

translation.en: decisions being made by the group collectively.
translation.zh: ‎群策群力

translation.en: The other piece of inspiration for us
translation.zh: ‎我们得到的另一启发

translation.en: comes in the form of reliability and resiliency.
translation.zh: ‎是群落的可靠性与韧性

translation.en: That swarm will not go down
translation.zh: ‎如果单个动物没有履行职责

translation.en: if one individual animal doesn't do what it's supposed to do.
translation.zh: ‎那个集群也不会崩溃

translation.en: Even if one of the agents falls out, or fails,
translation.zh: ‎就算其中一员掉队或失败

translation.en: or isn't able to complete the task,
translation.zh: ‎甚至未能完成任务

translation.en: the swarm will continue.
translation.zh: ‎这个集群也会继续运转

translation.en: And ultimately, that's what we'd like to have.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们最终想要达到的目标

translation.en: We have this need in combat scenarios for identifying enemy aircraft,
translation.zh: ‎在战斗中 我们需要识别敌机

translation.en: and it used to be we required one person controlling one robot.
translation.zh:
‎过去 每个机器人
‎都需要有一个人来操控

translation.en: As autonomy increases,
translation.zh: ‎随着自主性的提升

translation.en: I hope we will get to see a large number of robots
translation.zh: ‎我希望我们能做到

translation.en: being controlled by a very small number of people.
translation.zh: ‎只需极少数人就能控制大量的机器人

translation.en: I see no reason why we couldn't achieve a thousand eventually
translation.zh:
‎我不认为1000架无人机
‎是个无法企及的目标

translation.en: because each agent will be able to act of its own accord,
translation.zh: ‎因为每架飞机都将能自主行动

translation.en: and the sky's the limit.
translation.zh: ‎而天空是无边无际的

translation.en: We can scale our learning…
translation.zh: ‎我们可以扩展学习…

translation.en: [Justin B.] We've been working on swarming in simulation for quite some time,
translation.zh:
‎我们通过模拟
‎来研究无人机战群已经有段时间了

translation.en: and it is time to bring that to real-world aircraft.
translation.zh: ‎现在是时候用真机演练了

translation.en: We expect to be doing three robots at once over the network,
translation.zh:
‎我们希望通过网络
‎同时控制三个机器人

translation.en: and then starting to add more and more capabilities.
translation.zh: ‎然后逐渐扩充队伍

translation.en: We want to be able to test that on smaller systems,
translation.zh: ‎我们想在较小的系统上进行测试

translation.en: but take those same concepts and apply them to larger systems,
translation.zh:
‎然后将同样的概念
‎运用在更大的系统上

translation.en: like a fighter jet.
translation.zh: ‎比如战斗机

translation.en: [Brandon] We talk a lot about,
translation.zh: ‎我们进行过大量讨论

translation.en: how do you give a platoon the combat power of a battalion?
translation.zh: ‎如何让一个排拥有一个营的战斗力

translation.en: Or a battalion the combat power of a brigade?
translation.zh: ‎让一个营拥有一个旅的战斗力

translation.en: You can do that with swarming.
translation.zh: ‎利用无人机战群就能做到这一点

translation.en: And when you can unlock that power of swarming,
translation.zh: ‎当你解锁了无人机战群的力量

translation.en: you have just created a new strategic deterrence
translation.zh: ‎那你就为军事进攻创造了

translation.en: to military aggression.
translation.zh: ‎一种新的战略威慑

translation.en: [Bob] I think the most exciting thing is the number of young men and women
translation.zh:
‎我觉得最令人振奋的就是
‎如果我们行之得法

translation.en: who we will save if we really do this right.
translation.zh: ‎我们就能拯救许许多多的年轻男女

translation.en: And we trade machines
translation.zh: ‎我们不再用人命

translation.en: rather than human lives.
translation.zh: ‎而是用机器来换取胜利

translation.en: Some argue that autonomous weapons will make warfare more precise
translation.zh: ‎一些人认为自主武器会让战争更精确

translation.en: and more humane,
translation.zh: ‎更人性化

translation.en: but it's actually difficult to predict
translation.zh: ‎但其实我们很难预测

translation.en: exactly how autonomous weapons might change warfare ahead of time.
translation.zh: ‎自主武器在未来会如何改变战争形态

translation.en: It's like the invention of the Gatling gun.
translation.zh: ‎这就像加特林机枪的发明一样

translation.en: Richard Gatling was an inventor,
translation.zh: ‎理查加特林是位发明家

translation.en: and he saw soldiers coming back, wounded in the Civil War,
translation.zh:
‎他看到在南北战争中
‎战士们负伤归来

translation.en: and wanted to find ways to make warfare more humane.
translation.zh: ‎他想找到让战争更人道的方法

translation.en: To reduce the number of soldiers that were killed in war
translation.zh: ‎通过减少参战士兵的数量

translation.en: by reducing the number of soldiers in the battle.
translation.zh: ‎来减少战死的士兵数量

translation.en: And so he invented the Gatling gun, an automated gun turned by a crank
translation.zh:
‎于是他发明了加特林机枪
‎一种由曲柄转动

translation.en: that could automate the process of firing.
translation.zh: ‎可以自动射击的自动枪

translation.en: It increased effectively by a hundredfold the firepower that soldiers could deliver.
translation.zh:
‎它使士兵们的火力
‎有效地增加了一百倍

translation.en: Oftentimes, efforts to make warfare more precise and humane…
translation.zh:
‎通常 想要让战争
‎更精确、更人道的努力

translation.en: …can have the opposite effect.
translation.zh: ‎可能会带来相反的效果

translation.en: [Arash] Think about the effect of one errant drone strike
translation.zh:
‎想想在农村地区
‎一次错误的无人机袭击

translation.en: in a rural area
translation.zh: ‎会产生的影响

translation.en: that drives the local populace against the United States,
translation.zh: ‎它会促使当地民众反对美国

translation.en: against the local government. You know, supposedly the good guys.
translation.zh:
‎反对当地政府
‎而他们本应该都是好人

translation.en: Now magnify that by 1,000.
translation.zh: ‎现在把程度扩大1000倍

translation.en: [Emilia] The creation of a weapon system
translation.zh: ‎一个廉价、可扩展

translation.en: that is cheap, scalable, and doesn't require human operators
translation.zh: ‎不需要人类操作的武器系统的创立

translation.en: drastically changes the actual barriers to conflict.
translation.zh: ‎极大地改变了战争的实际障碍

translation.en: It keeps me up at night to think of a world where war is ubiquitous,
translation.zh:
‎一想到战争无处不在
‎我们无需再承担战争带来的

translation.en: and we no longer carry the human and financial cost of war
translation.zh:
‎人力和财政代价的世界
‎我便夜不能寐

translation.en: because we're just so far removed from…
translation.zh: ‎因为我们距离那些即将…

translation.en: the lives that will be lost.
translation.zh: ‎消逝的生命太过遥远了

translation.en: [Sean] This whole thing is haunting me.
translation.zh: ‎这整件事深深困扰着我

translation.en: I just needed an example of artificial intelligence misuse.
translation.zh:
‎我本来只是需要
‎一个滥用人工智能的例子

translation.en: The unanticipated consequences of doing that simple thought experiment
translation.zh:
‎实践这个思想实验
‎所带来的意想不到的后果

translation.en: have gone way too far.
translation.zh: ‎已经远超出了预期

translation.en: When I gave the presentation
translation.zh: ‎在我进行有关

translation.en: on the toxic molecules created by AI technology,
translation.zh:
‎人工智能技术
‎制造的有毒分子的演讲时

translation.en: the audience's jaws dropped.
translation.zh: ‎听众们都惊掉了下巴

translation.en: [Fabio] The next decision was whether we should publish this information.
translation.zh:
‎接下来要决定的
‎是我们是否应该发布这一信息

translation.en: On one hand, you want to warn the world
translation.zh: ‎一方面 你想警告世界

translation.en: of these sorts of capabilities, but on the other hand,
translation.zh: ‎要警惕这类能力 但另一方面

translation.en: you don't want to give somebody the idea if they had never had it before.
translation.zh:
‎你并不想让那些
‎从没想到过这一点的人得到灵感

translation.en: We decided it was worth publishing
translation.zh: ‎我们最终认为它值得冒险发表

translation.en: to maybe find some ways to mitigate the misuse of this type of AI
translation.zh:
‎这样也许可以在这种类型的
‎人工智能滥用发生前 找到方法

translation.en: before it occurs.
translation.zh: ‎减少此类滥用

translation.en: The general public's reaction was shocking.
translation.zh: ‎公众的普遍反应是震惊

translation.en: We can see the metrics on the page, how many people have accessed it.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以在页面上看到统计
‎有多少人浏览过文章

translation.en: The kinds of articles we normally write, we're lucky if we get--
translation.zh: ‎我们平常写的那些文章 如果…

translation.en: A few thousand people look at our article over a period of a year or multiple years.
translation.zh:
‎在一年或几年间能有几千人
‎阅读我们的文章 我们就很幸运了

translation.en: It was 10,000 people had read it within a week.
translation.zh: ‎一周之内有一万人阅读了那篇文章

translation.en: Then it was 20,000, then it was 30,000, then it was 40,000,
translation.zh: ‎然后是两万、三万、四万人

translation.en: and we were up to 10,000 people a day.
translation.zh: ‎我们一天就有一万的阅读量

translation.en: [Sean] We've done The Economist, the Financial Times.
translation.zh:
‎我们的文章被
‎《经济学家》《金融时报》引用

translation.en: Radiolab, you know, they reached out. Like, I've heard of Radiolab!
translation.zh:
‎“科普电台”联系了我们
‎我听说过“科普电台”！

translation.en: But then the reactions turned into this thing that's out of control.
translation.zh: ‎但随后 人们的反应开始失控了

translation.en: When we look at those tweets, it's like, "Oh my God, could they do anything worse?"
translation.zh:
‎我们看着那些推文 大家说：
‎“天啊 他们还能更恶劣点吗？”

translation.en: Why did they do this?
translation.zh: ‎他们为什么要这么做？

translation.en: And then we got an invitation I never would have anticipated.
translation.zh: ‎后来我们接到了一个意想不到的邀请

translation.en: There was a lot of discussion inside the White House about the article,
translation.zh: ‎白宫内部对这篇文章进行了很多讨论

translation.en: and they wanted to talk to us urgently.
translation.zh: ‎他们急切地想跟我们谈谈

translation.en: Obviously, it's an incredible honor
translation.zh: ‎显然 能和这种级别的人对话

translation.en: to be able to talk to people at this level.
translation.zh: ‎是一种无上荣耀

translation.en: But then it hits you
translation.zh: ‎但接着你会想到：

translation.en: like, "Oh my goodness, it's the White House. The boss."
translation.zh: ‎“天啊 这是白宫啊 是大首领”

translation.en: This involved putting together data sets that were open source…
translation.zh:
‎这涉及到
‎整理汇总开放源代码的数据…

translation.en: And in about six hours, the model was able to generate about over 40,000…
translation.zh:
‎经过约六小时
‎该模型已经能生成约四万多个…

translation.en: [Sean] They asked questions about how much computing power you needed,
translation.zh: ‎他们问你们需要多强大的计算机

translation.en: and we told them it was nothing special.
translation.zh: ‎我们告诉他们没什么特别要求

translation.en: Literally a standard run-of-the-mill, six-year-old Mac.
translation.zh:
‎一台普普通通
‎用了六年的苹果电脑就行

translation.en: And that blew them away.
translation.zh: ‎这让他们大吃一惊

translation.en: The folks that are in charge of understanding chemical warfare agents
translation.zh: ‎那些负责研究化学战剂的人

translation.en: and governmental agencies, they had no idea of this potential.
translation.zh: ‎还有政府机构 他们不了解这种潜力

translation.en: We've got this cookbook to make these chemical weapons,
translation.zh:
‎我们得到了
‎这本制作化学武器的食谱书

translation.en: and in the hands of a bad actor that has malicious intent
translation.zh: ‎一旦它落入居心叵测的坏人手中

translation.en: it could be utterly horrifying.
translation.zh: ‎情况可能会变得非常可怕

translation.en: People have to sit up and listen,
translation.zh: ‎大家必须坐下来好好听

translation.en: and we have to take steps to either regulate the technology
translation.zh:
‎我们必须采取措施
‎要么规范这项技术

translation.en: or constrain it in a way that it can't be misused.
translation.zh: ‎要么限制它 令其无法被滥用

translation.en: Because the potential for lethality…
translation.zh: ‎因为它潜在的杀伤力…

translation.en: is terrifying.
translation.zh: ‎骇人听闻

translation.en: The question of the ethics of AI is largely addressed by society,
translation.zh:
‎人工智能的伦理问题
‎主要是由社会来解决

translation.en: not by the engineers or technologists, the mathematicians.
translation.zh:
‎而不是靠工程师、
‎技术专家、或数学家

translation.en: Every technology that we bring forth, every novel innovation,
translation.zh: ‎我们带来的每一项技术 每一种创新

translation.en: ultimately falls under the purview of how society believes we should use it.
translation.zh:
‎最终都落在了
‎社会认为我们应该使用它的范畴

translation.en: [Bob] Right now, the Department of Defense says,
translation.zh: ‎现在 国防部说：

translation.en: "The only thing that is saying we are going to kill something
translation.zh:
‎“在战场上
‎唯一能说我们要实施杀戮的

translation.en: on the battlefield is a human."
translation.zh: ‎只有人类”

translation.en: A machine can do the killing,
translation.zh: ‎机器可以实施杀戮

translation.en: but only at the behest of a human operator,
translation.zh: ‎但只能在人类操作员的命令之下

translation.en: and I don't see that ever changing.
translation.zh: ‎我认为这一点永远不会改变

translation.en: [Arash] They assure us that this type of technology will be safe.
translation.zh: ‎他们向我们保证这种技术是安全的

translation.en: But the United States military just doesn't have a trustworthy reputation
translation.zh: ‎但美国军方在无人机战争方面的声誉

translation.en: with drone warfare.
translation.zh: ‎并不值得信赖

translation.en: And so, when it comes to trusting the U.S. military with AI,
translation.zh:
‎因此 说到要在
‎人工智能方面信任美国军方

translation.en: I would say, you know, the track record kinda speaks for itself.
translation.zh: ‎我想说 过去的记录说明了一切

translation.en: [Paul] The U.S. Defense Department policy on the use of autonomy in weapons
translation.zh: ‎美国国防部关于让武器自主化的政策

translation.en: does not ban any kind of weapon system.
translation.zh: ‎并没有禁止任何一种武器系统

translation.en: And even if militaries might not want autonomous weapons,
translation.zh: ‎就算军方本身可能不想要自主武器

translation.en: we could see militaries handing over more decisions to machines
translation.zh:
‎但我们也能看到他们
‎将越来越多的决定权交给了机器

translation.en: just to keep pace with competitors.
translation.zh: ‎只为能追上竞争对手的步伐

translation.en: And that could drive militaries to automate decisions
translation.zh: ‎这可能会促使军方将他们

translation.en: that they may not want to.
translation.zh: ‎并不想自动化的决策自动化

translation.en: [Bob] Vladimir Putin said, "Whoever leads in AI is going to rule the world."
translation.zh:
‎普京说过：“谁在人工智能领域领先
‎谁就将统治世界”

translation.en: President Xi has made it clear that AI is one of the number one technologies
translation.zh:
‎习主席也明确表示过
‎人工智能是中国想要成为主导的

translation.en: that China wants to dominate in.
translation.zh: ‎头号技术之一

translation.en: We're clearly in a technological competition.
translation.zh: ‎很显然 我们正处于一场技术竞赛中

translation.en: [Brandon] You hear people talk about guardrails,
translation.zh: ‎你会听到人们谈论防护

translation.en: and I believe that is what people should be doing.
translation.zh: ‎我认为这确实是人们应该做的事

translation.en: But there is a very real race for AI superiority.
translation.zh:
‎但争夺人工智能优势地位的竞赛
‎是真实存在的

translation.en: And our adversaries, whether it's China, whether it's Russia, whether it's Iran,
translation.zh:
‎而我们的竞争对手
‎不论是中国、俄罗斯、或者伊朗

translation.en: are not going to give two thoughts to what our policy says around AI.
translation.zh:
‎都不会太在乎
‎我们在人工智能方面的政策

translation.en: You're seeing a lot more conversations around AI policy,
translation.zh:
‎你会看到越来越多
‎关于人工智能政策的讨论

translation.en: but I wish more leaders would have the conversation
translation.zh: ‎但我希望有越来越多的领导人会说：

translation.en: saying, ''How quickly can we build this thing?
translation.zh: ‎“我们多快能搭建起这个东西？

translation.en: Let's resource the heck out of it and build it."
translation.zh:
‎我们快为它提供资源
‎把它搭建起来吧”

translation.en: We are at the Association of the U.S. Army's biggest trade show of the year.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在是在
‎美国陆军协会一年中最盛大的贸易展

translation.en: Basically, any vendor who is selling a product or technology into a military
translation.zh:
‎基本上 所有向军方
‎出售产品或技术的供应商

translation.en: will be exhibiting.
translation.zh: ‎都会参加展览

translation.en: [man 18] The Tyndall Air Force Base has four of our robots
translation.zh: ‎廷德尔空军基地有四个我们的机器人

translation.en: that patrol their base 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
translation.zh:
‎它们每周七天
‎每天24小时都在基地巡逻

translation.en: We can add everything from cameras to sensors to whatever you need.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以添加任何东西
‎从摄像头到传感器 只要你需要

translation.en: Manipulator arms. Again, just to complete the mission that the customer has in mind.
translation.zh:
‎机械手臂 还是那句话
‎只为达成客户心中所想

translation.en: [man 19] What if your enemy introduces AI?
translation.zh:
‎如果你的敌人
‎引入了人工智能怎么办？

translation.en: A fighting system that thinks faster than you, responds faster,
translation.zh:
‎一个比你思考得更快
‎反应比人类快的战斗系统

translation.en: than what a human being can do? We've got to be prepared.
translation.zh: ‎人类又能怎么办？我们必须未雨绸缪

translation.en: We train our systems to collect intel on the enemy,
translation.zh: ‎我们训练我们的系统收集敌人的情报

translation.en: managing enemy targets with humans supervising the kill chain.
translation.zh:
‎管理敌方目标
‎并由人类监督它的杀伤链

translation.en: -[Brandon] Hi, General. -How you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-将军您好 布兰登曾
‎-您好吗？

translation.en: [Brandon] Good, sir. How are you? Um…
translation.zh: ‎很好 长官 您好吗？

translation.en: I'll just say no one is investing more in an AI pilot.
translation.zh:
‎我是想说 我们在人工智能
‎飞行员身上的投入无人能及

translation.en: Our AI pilot's called Hivemind,
translation.zh: ‎我们的人工智能飞行员叫“蜂巢思维”

translation.en: so we applied it to our quadcopter Nova. It goes inside buildings,
translation.zh:
‎我们将它应用在了我们的四旋翼
‎飞行器诺瓦身上 它能进入建筑内部

translation.en: explores them ahead of special operation forces
translation.zh: ‎在特种作战部队和步兵部队之前

translation.en: and infantry forces.
translation.zh: ‎探清情况

translation.en: We're applying Hivemind to V-BAT,
translation.zh: ‎我们将“蜂巢思维”用于V-BAT无人机

translation.en: so I think about, you know, putting up hundreds of those teams.
translation.zh: ‎我在考虑组建数百个这样的战队

translation.en: Whether it's the Taiwan Strait,
translation.zh: ‎无论是在台湾海峡

translation.en: whether it's in the Ukraine, deterring our adversaries.
translation.zh: ‎还是在乌克兰 都能威慑我们的对手

translation.en: So, pretty excited about it.
translation.zh: ‎我对此充满期待

translation.en: -All right. Thank you. -So. Thank you, General.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 谢谢您
‎-谢谢您 将军

translation.en: AI pilots should be ubiquitous, and that should be the case by 2025, 2030.
translation.zh:
‎人工智能飞行员
‎应该能在2025年 2030年普遍使用

translation.en: Its adoption will be rapid throughout militaries across the world.
translation.zh: ‎它将迅速在世界各地的军队中普及

translation.en: What do you do with the Romanian military, their UAS guy?
translation.zh:
‎你要怎么对付
‎罗马尼亚军队的无人机？

translation.en: [soldier] High-tech in the military.
translation.zh: ‎军事高科技

translation.en: We've spent half a billion dollars to date on building an AI pilot.
translation.zh:
‎到目前为止 我们已经花了
‎五亿美元来打造人工智能飞行员

translation.en: We will spend another billion dollars over the next five years. And that is…
translation.zh:
‎未来的五年里
‎我们还会再投入十亿美元资金 ‎这正是我们在美国
‎赢得创纪录项目的主要原因

translation.en: It's a major reason why we're winning the programs of record in the U.S.
translation.zh:
‎这正是我们在美国
‎赢得创纪录项目的主要原因

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: ‎厉害

translation.en: I mean, it's impressive. You succeeded to weaponize that.
translation.zh:
‎非常惊人
‎你们已经成功将它武器化了？

translation.en: Uh, it is… This is not weaponized yet.
translation.zh: ‎这个还没有被武器化

translation.en: So not yet. But yes, in the future.
translation.zh: ‎还没有 但未来会的

translation.en: Our customers think about it as a truck. We think of it as an intelligent truck
translation.zh:
‎我们的客户认为它是一辆卡车
‎而我们认为它是一辆智能卡车

translation.en: that can do a lot of different things.
translation.zh: ‎它可以做很多不同的事情

translation.en: Thank you, buddy.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 伙计
‎-嗯

translation.en: [Brandon] I'll make sure to follow up with you.
translation.zh: ‎我一定会跟进你的情况

translation.en: If you come back in 10 years,
translation.zh: ‎如果你十年后回来

translation.en: you'll see that, um… AI and autonomy will have dominated this entire market.
translation.zh:
‎你会看到人工智能
‎和自主系统将主导整个市场

translation.en: [Nathan] Forces that are supported by AI and autonomy
translation.zh:
‎有人工智能
‎和自主系统支持的武装力量

translation.en: will absolutely dominate, crush, and destroy forces without.
translation.zh:
‎绝对会支配、碾压和摧毁
‎没有人工智能和自主系统的武装力量

translation.en: It'll be the equivalent of horses going up against tanks,
translation.zh: ‎这就相当于马匹与坦克的对抗

translation.en: people with swords going up against the machine gun.
translation.zh: ‎刀剑与机关枪的对抗

translation.en: It will not even be close.
translation.zh: ‎完全不可同日而语

translation.en: [Brandon] It will become ubiquitous, used at every spectrum of warfare,
translation.zh: ‎它将被普遍应用于战争的各个方面

translation.en: the tactical level,
translation.zh: ‎在战术层面

translation.en: the strategic level,
translation.zh: ‎在战略层面

translation.en: operating at speeds that humans cannot fathom today.
translation.zh: ‎以今天的人类无法理解的速度运行

translation.en: [Paul] Commanders are already overwhelmed with too much information.
translation.zh: ‎指挥官们已经被过多的信息淹没了

translation.en: Imagery from satellites, and drones, and sensors.
translation.zh: ‎来自卫星、无人机和传感器的图像

translation.en: One of the things AI can do
translation.zh: ‎人工智能的其中一项能力

translation.en: is help a commander more rapidly understand what is occurring.
translation.zh: ‎就是帮助指挥官们更高效地了解现状

translation.en: And then, "What are the decisions I need to make?"
translation.zh:
‎然后思考：
‎“我需要做出怎样的决定？”

translation.en: [Bob] Artificial intelligence will take into account all the factors
translation.zh: ‎人工智能将考虑所有

translation.en: that determine the way war is fought,
translation.zh: ‎决定战争方式的因素

translation.en: come up with strategies…
translation.zh: ‎出谋划策…

translation.en: and give recommendations on how to win a battle.
translation.zh: ‎并为如何赢得战斗提出建议

translation.en: [man 20] We at Lockheed Martin, like our Department of Defense customer,
translation.zh:
‎在洛克希德马丁公司
‎和我们的国防部客户一样

translation.en: view artificial intelligence as a key technology enabler
translation.zh: ‎我们将人工智能视为指挥与控制的

translation.en: for command and control.
translation.zh: ‎关键技术推动力

translation.en: [analyst 1] The rate of spread has an average of two feet per second.
translation.zh: ‎传播速度平均为每秒0.6米

translation.en: [analyst 2] This perimeter is roughly 700 acres.
translation.zh: ‎视野计约为283.3公顷

translation.en: [man 20] The fog of war is a reality for us on the defense side,
translation.zh:
‎战争迷雾对于我们防御方来说
‎确实是一种需要面对的现实

translation.en: but it has parallels to being in the environment
translation.zh: ‎但它与处于自然环境中

translation.en: and having to make decisions for wildfires as well.
translation.zh:
‎又不得不针对野火
‎做出决策也有相似之处

translation.en: [analyst 1] The Washburn fire is just north of the city of Wawona.
translation.zh: ‎沃什伯恩大火就发生在瓦沃纳市北部

translation.en: [man 20] You're having to make decisions with imperfect data.
translation.zh: ‎你必须借助并不完善的数据做出决策

translation.en: And so how do we have AI help us with that fog of war?
translation.zh:
‎那我们要如何让
‎人工智能帮我们摆脱战争迷雾呢？

translation.en: Wildfires are very chaotic.
translation.zh: ‎野火非常混乱

translation.en: They're very complex,
translation.zh: ‎它们非常复杂

translation.en: and so we're working to utilize artificial intelligence
translation.zh: ‎所以我们正在努力利用人工智能

translation.en: to help make decisions.
translation.zh: ‎来帮助我们做决定

translation.en: The Cognitive Mission Manager is a program we're building
translation.zh:
‎“认知任务管理器”
‎是我们正在开发的一个程序

translation.en: that takes aerial infrared video
translation.zh: ‎它会采集空中红外视频

translation.en: and then processes it through our AI algorithms
translation.zh:
‎然后通过我们的
‎人工智能算法进行处理

translation.en: to be able to predict the future state of the fire.
translation.zh: ‎从而预测火灾的未来状态

translation.en: [man 21] As we move into the future,
translation.zh: ‎展望未来

translation.en: the Cognitive Mission Manager will use simulation,
translation.zh: ‎“认知任务管理器”将借助模拟

translation.en: running scenarios over thousands of cycles,
translation.zh: ‎在数千个循环中运行某些场景

translation.en: to recommend the most effective way to deploy resources
translation.zh: ‎从而给出效率最高的资源配置方案

translation.en: to suppress high-priority areas of fire.
translation.zh: ‎以抑制高优先级区域火灾

translation.en: It'll say, "Go perform an aerial suppression with a Firehawk here."
translation.zh:
‎它会说：“去这里
‎用‘火鹰’进行空中压制

translation.en: "Take ground crews that clear brush…
translation.zh: ‎率领清理灌木的地面小组

translation.en: …firefighters that are hosing down,
translation.zh: ‎以及喷水的消防队员

translation.en: and deploy them into the highest priority areas."
translation.zh: ‎将他们拉到最高优先级的地区”

translation.en: Those decisions will be able to be generated faster
translation.zh: ‎这些决策将能够更快

translation.en: and more efficiently.
translation.zh: ‎更有效地产生

translation.en: [Justin T.] We view AI as uniquely allowing our humans
translation.zh: ‎我们认为 人工智能是唯一

translation.en: to be able to keep up with the ever-changing environment.
translation.zh: ‎能让人类跟上瞬息万变的环境的东西

translation.en: And there are a credible number of parallels
translation.zh: ‎洛克希德马丁公司的防御业务中

translation.en: to what we're used to at Lockheed Martin on the defense side.
translation.zh: ‎有很多与上述情况类似

translation.en: [Emilia] The military is no longer talking about just using AI
translation.zh: ‎军方不再只谈论使用人工智能

translation.en: in individual weapons systems to make targeting and kill decisions,
translation.zh:
‎和单个武器系统
‎来进行目标定位和杀伐决策

translation.en: but integrating AI
translation.zh: ‎而是将人工智能整合到

translation.en: into the whole decision-making architecture of the military.
translation.zh: ‎整个军事决策架构中

translation.en: [Bob] The Army has a big project called Project Convergence.
translation.zh:
‎陆军有一个
‎名叫“项目融合”的大型项目

translation.en: The Navy has Overmatch.
translation.zh: ‎海军有“超配计划”

translation.en: And the Air Force has Advanced Battle Management System.
translation.zh: ‎而空军有“先进作战管理系统”

translation.en: The Department of Defense is trying to figure out,
translation.zh: ‎国防部正在试图弄清楚

translation.en: "How do we put all these pieces together,
translation.zh: ‎“我们要如何将这些板块拼凑在一起

translation.en: so that we can operate faster than our adversary
translation.zh: ‎让我们能比对手行动得更快

translation.en: and really gain an advantage?"
translation.zh: ‎并获得真正的优势？”

translation.en: [Stacie] An AI Battle Manager would be like a fairly high-ranking General
translation.zh:
‎人工智能战斗管理人
‎将是一位级别相当高的将军

translation.en: who's in charge of the battle.
translation.zh: ‎它会负责指挥战斗

translation.en: Helping to give orders to large numbers of forces,
translation.zh: ‎协助对众多的军队下达指令

translation.en: coordinating the actions of all of the weapons that are out there,
translation.zh: ‎协调所有武器的行动

translation.en: and doing it at a speed that no human could keep up with.
translation.zh:
‎而且它的行动速度
‎是任何人类都无法企及的

translation.en: [Emilia] We've spent the past 70 years
translation.zh: ‎在过去的70年里

translation.en: building the most sophisticated military on the planet,
translation.zh: ‎我们打造出了地球上最先进的军队

translation.en: and now we're facing the decision as to whether we want to cede control
translation.zh:
‎现在我们面临的决定是
‎是否要把对基础设施的控制权

translation.en: over that infrastructure to an algorithm, to software.
translation.zh: ‎交给算法、交给软件

translation.en: And the consequences of that decision
translation.zh: ‎而这个决定带来的结果

translation.en: could trigger the full weight of our military arsenals.
translation.zh: ‎可能会触发我们军事武库的全部力量

translation.en: That's not one Hiroshima. That's hundreds.
translation.zh:
‎届时就不是一次广岛核爆
‎而是成百上千次

translation.en: This is the time that we need to act
translation.zh: ‎现在是我们需要采取行动的时候了

translation.en: because the window to actually contain this risk is rapidly closing.
translation.zh:
‎因为控制这种风险的窗口
‎正在迅速关闭

translation.en: [UN chair] This afternoon, we start with international security challenges
translation.zh:
‎今天下午 我们首先讨论
‎致命自主武器系统领域的

translation.en: posed by emerging technologies
